title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Transactional Shell-Based Mathematics Courseware Development and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently develop three or more mathematical courseware modules using the Transactional Shell Framework.
Learners can systematically design mathematical problem-solving processes by utilizing predefined instructional strategies.
Learners can achieve 80% or more learning outcomes through smartphone-based assessment tools in offline environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
